meaningMnemonic: The <radical>flowers</radical> that grow on your <radical>roof</radical> that look like a sleeping <radical>bear</radical> is <kanji>sedge</kanji>. Sedge grow all over the world!
readingMnemonic: The next time you see a <kanji>sedge</kanji> bite into it. It tastes like <reading>suga</reading>r (すが)! Luckily, it don't taste like bear.
